articles.title: Lost Ark's first year saw “growing pains,” but Amazon has big plans - PCGamesN
articles.description: As Lost Ark year two begins worldwide, Amazon Games talks to PCGamesN about the challenges of localisation, bots, crossover events, and bringing in new players.
articles.content: It’s been just over a year since Lost Ark launched worldwide, and the Korean-developed game has proven itself as one of the best new MMOs on PC despite a series of teething issues including server tr… [+7859 chars]
